name: Feature-Sliced Design (Team Custom)
description: Domain-centric FSD architecture based on v2.1 with team adaptations
teamPhilosophy: One feature = one domain (like a backend service)

directories.entities: Pure domain models (optional, can merge into features)

removed.widgets: Team Custom: merged into features/pages for simplicity

pages.description: 라우트 + 페이지 특화 로직 (v2.1 Pages First 원칙)
pages.teamPrinciple: 페이지 특화 로직은 pages에 유지 (불필요한 feature 추출 금지)

features.description: 도메인 중심 사용자 인터랙션 (백엔드 서비스와 유사)
features.teamPrinciple: One feature = one domain with multiple related actions

entities.description: 순수 도메인 모델 (읽기 전용, 인터랙션 없음)
entities.teamNote: Simple projects can merge entity types into features

descriptions.model: Business logic, state management, hooks, types

typeOnlyAllowed.description: Type-only imports between features allowed with 'import type' syntax

dependencies.teamException: Type-only imports between features are pragmatically allowed

entityPurity.description: Entities must not have external dependencies except shared
checks: NO useState, useEffect, or other React hooks
NO API calls (GET only if needed)

publicApi.description: Each slice must have an explicit public API (index.ts file)

sliceIsolation.description: Slices within the same layer cannot import each other (except type-only)
sliceIsolation.teamException: Type-only imports allowed with 'import type' syntax

crossImport.description: Use only public API imports between slices

domainCentricFeature.description: Features should represent domains (like backend services), not single actions
domainCentricFeature.teamPrinciple: Related actions grouped together within domain feature

pagesFirstPrinciple.description: Keep page-specific logic in pages, don't extract unless reused on 2+ pages

typeOnlyFeatureImports.description: Feature-to-feature imports must use 'import type' syntax only

sharedMustBeGeneric.description: Shared layer must contain only generic utilities, NO domain-specific code

principles: One feature = one domain (like backend service class)
Related actions grouped together (auth: sign-in + sign-up + find-password)
Shared logic within domain (validation, schemas, types)
Tightly coupled features should be merged
Pages First: keep page-specific logic in pages

layerSimplifications.reason: Simplified to 4 core layers + optional entities

mergingStrategy.when: Features share significant types/logic OR actions are sequential in user flow

examples.separate: auth (sign-in + sign-up) AND payment (process + refund) → features/auth + features/payment
